sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { User } from '../../types'; interface ProfileProps { user: User; onUpdateProfile: (data: Partial) => void; onLogout: () => void; } const Profile: React.FC = ({ user, onUpdateProfile, onLogout }) => { return (

{user.name}

{user.email}

Member since {new Date(user.createdAt).toLocaleDateString()}

Account Settings

); }; export default Profile;
